articles.title: SpaceX delivers Russian, Native American women to station - India TV News
articles.description: SpaceX delivers Russian: Russian, first time in 20 years, hitched a ride from NASA's Kennedy Space Center, the result of a new agreement reached despite friction over the war in Ukraine.

articles.title: Latest 4-member SpaceX crew, including cosmonaut, welcomed aboard space station - Rappler
articles.description: The crew consists of two American NASA astronauts – flight commander Nicole Aunapu Mann and pilot Josh Cassada – as well as Japanese astronaut Koichi Wakata and cosmonaut Anna Kikina, the first Russian aboard an American spacecraft in 20 years

articles.title: "No One Should Be In Jail For Possessing Marijuana": Biden - NDTV
articles.description: US President Joe Biden pardoned thousands of Americans convicted of marijuana possession Thursday in a major new step towards destigmatizing the drug -- and fulfilling a promise to his supporters a month before midterm elections.
articles.content:
